price: "Kuma wanda ya bijire* daga ambatõNa (Alƙur'ãni) to, lalle ne rãyuwa mai ƙunci ta tabbata a gare shi, kuma Munã tãyar da shi a Rãnar ¡iyãma yanã makãho."
arabic: وَمَنۡ أَعۡرَضَ عَن ذِكۡرِي فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ مَعِيشَةٗ ضَنكٗا وَنَحۡشُرُهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ أَعۡمَىٰ
footnotes: * Wanda ya bijire daga ãyõyin Allah, shĩ ne kãfirin da bai yarda da shiga Musulunci ba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
